summary: Are you sick of looking at the boring and ugly vanilla hair on NPC\'s? I know i am! This Mod changes the Default NPC hair to better looking hair from other mods.
descriptionHtml:
UPDATE: 1.2
Delete 1.1 then install 1.2

--------------------------------------+============{Description}============+--------------------------------------
Are you sick of looking at the boring and ugly vanilla hair on NPC\'s? I know i am! This Mod changes the Default NPC hair to better looking hair from other mods.

If there is any particular hair you would like on an NPC please leave the Hairstyle Colour and name of the NPC in the comments.

Also if any bugs are found please report them in comments. Thanks :D


-------------------------------------+============{Requirements}============+-------------------------------------
ApachiiSkyHair
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/
Crazy hairs and demoness hairs conversion by zzjay
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19623/
Hair Pack
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3809/
Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110
Hair packs of Fallout3 + Patch
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17993
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18220


----------------------------------+============{Recommendations}============+----------------------------------
Pretty Face
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887


---------------------------------------+============{Installation}============+---------------------------------------
[Manual]
Copy:
NoMoreVanillaHair.esp
meshes
textures
To the Skyrim Data folder.

[Nexus Mod Manager]
Download and Install


----------------------------------------+============{Uninstall}============+----------------------------------------
NoMoreVanillaHair.esp
data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint/skyrim.esm
Data/meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/skyrim.esm


----------------------------------+============{Updates/Releases}============+----------------------------------
1.1 - This update requires a complete deletion of the old pack (1.0) before install.
Also Required are 2 more hair packs Oblivion hair and Fallout 3 hair, check requirements for links.
1.0 - Initial Release


-----------------------------------------+============{Credits}============+-----------------------------------------
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii
Cazy hairs and demoness hairs conversion by zzjay
Hair Pack by newermind43
Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion by Radioragae
Hair packs of Fallout3 + Patch by Radioragae
author: R4nd0mZ0RZ
